summary.span: 表示一个触发器，它会在绑定数据满足指定条件时应用属性值或执行操作。

span.span: Represents a trigger that applies property values or performs actions when the bound data meets a specified condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 、 和都 具有触发器集合。, , and all have a triggers collection. 当数据对象的属性值与指定的匹配时，可使用来设置属性值 。A allows you to set property values when the property value of the data object matches a specified . 例如，如果您正在显示 `Employee` 对象列表，则可能希望在每个当前的出席情况下，前景颜色不同 `Employee's` 。For example, if you are displaying a list of `Employee` objects, you may want the foreground color to be different based on each `Employee's` current attendance. (例如， `Employees` 当前正在休假的用户以紫色前景显示。 ) 在某些情况下，可能更适合创建转换器或使用 。(For example, `Employees` who are currently on vacation are displayed with a purple foreground.) In some scenarios it may be more suitable to create a converter or to use a . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview)。For more information, see the [Data Templating Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview). 请注意，必须 在上指定和 属性，以 使数据触发器有意义。Note that you must specify both the and properties on a for the data trigger to be meaningful. 如果未指定一个或两个属性，则会引发异常。If one or both of the properties are not specified, an exception is thrown. 对象的属性 只能包含 对象。The property of a object can only consist of objects. 将 子对象添加到 对象会将该子级隐式添加到 对象的 。Adding a child to a object implicitly adds it to the for the object. 对象不受支持;仅 支持 对象。 objects are not supported; only supports objects. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，的将 绑定到 *位置*，即 *位置* 对象。In the following example, the of the is bound to *Places*, an of *Place* objects. *放置* 对象具有属性 *名称* 和 *状态*。*Place* objects have properties *Name* and *State*. 每个都 显示一个 *位置* 对象。Each of the displays a *Place* object. 示例中的将应用于每个 。The in the example is applied to each . 指定了， 以便在*位置*数据项的*状态*为 "WA" 时，相应的前景 设置为红色。The is specified such that if the *State* of the *Place* data item is "WA" then the foreground of the corresponding is set to Red. [!code-xaml[DataTrigger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTrigger/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] 下面的示例演示如何 在绑定数据满足指定条件时使用、操作和来对属性进行动画处理。The following example shows how to use a , a action, and a to animate a property when bound data meets a specified condition. 该示例显示控件中的清单信息 。The example displays inventory information in a control. 它使用 对 包含脱销书籍的每个的进行动画处理 。It uses a to animate the of every that contains an out-of-stock book. [!code-xaml[AnimatePropertyStoryboards#GraphicsMMDataTriggerStoryboardWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AnimatePropertyStoryboards/XAML/DataTriggerStoryboardExample.xaml#graphicsmmdatatriggerstoryboardwholepage)]

summary.span: 获取或设置产生数据对象的属性值的绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding that produces the property value of the data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此绑定生成的属性值与属性指定的值进行比较 。The property value produced by this binding is compared with the value specified by the property. 该值首先转换为绑定 (的值的类型（如果可能) ），然后使用方法对这两个值进行比较 `Object.Equals` 。That value is first converted to the type of the value of the binding (if possible), and then the two values are compared using the `Object.Equals` method. 如果两个值相等，则会应用关联的操作或资源库。If the two values are equal, then the associated actions or setters are applied. 您将创建一个绑定，并使用 属性绑定到 (绑定源对象) 的特定对象的属性。You create a binding and use the property to bind to a property of a certain object (the binding source object). 例如，可以绑定到*任务*的*Priority*属性。For example, you may bind to the *Priority* property of a *Task*. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据绑定概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview)。For more information, see [Data Binding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview). 请注意，必须 在上指定和 属性，以 使数据触发器有意义。Note that you must specify both the and properties on a for the data trigger to be meaningful. 如果未设置其中一个或两个属性，则会引发异常。If one or both of the properties are not set, an exception is thrown. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *声明**declaration* 零个或多个由逗号分隔的属性赋值子句 (，) 。Zero or more attribute-assignment clauses separated by commas (,). 有关详细信息，请参阅 [绑定标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension) 。See [Binding Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension) for more information. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将 名为的元素的设置为（ `border` `Yellow` 如果该 `TaskType` 属性为） `TaskType.Home` 。In the following example, the sets the of the element named `border` to `Yellow` if the `TaskType` property is `TaskType.Home`. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro#DT](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro/xaml/window1.xaml#dt)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro#DataTrigger](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro/xaml/window1.xaml#datatrigger)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro#AddingMore2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro/xaml/window1.xaml#addingmore2)] 有关此示例的详细讨论，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview)。For a detailed discussion of this example, see [Data Templating Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview).

summary.span: 处理标记扩展为 对象的属性提供值的情况。

span.span: Handles cases where a markup extension provides a value for a property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是在类级别应用的特性所引用的方法 ，这意味着此方法将处理所有使用标记扩展来设置值的尝试 。This is the method referenced by an applied attribute at the class level, which means that this method processes all attempts to set values of with a markup extension. 通常不直接调用此方法。You do not typically call this method directly.

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象描述当数据项满足指定条件时要应用的属性值。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects, which describe the property values to apply when the data item meets the specified condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ZeroOrMoreSetters**ZeroOrMoreSetters* 零个或多个 对象。Zero or more objects. 当数据项满足指定条件时，可以通过来启动操作或使用来 应用属性值。A allows you to start actions or to use s to apply property values when the data item meets a specified condition. 如果有多个 setter 在同一 setter 集合中设置相同的属性，则使用最后声明的 setter。If there is more than one setter setting the same property in the same setter collection, the setter that is declared last is used. 对象的属性 只能包含 对象。The property of a object can only consist of objects. 将 子对象添加到 对象会将该子级隐式添加到 对象的 。Adding a child to a object implicitly adds it to the for the object. 对象不受支持;仅 支持 对象。 objects are not supported; only supports objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 在中定义的两个对象 。The following example shows two objects that are defined in a . 应用于*AuctionItem*数据对象 (在此示例中未显示) ，其属性为*SpecialFeatures*。The is applied to *AuctionItem* data objects (not shown in this example), which have the property *SpecialFeatures*. 首先指定了第一个， 以便在数据对象的 *SpecialFeatures* 值为 *Color*的情况下显示项，并显示带有 `DodgerBlue` 深蓝色标题的背景。The first is specified such that if the data object has a *SpecialFeatures* value of *Color*, then the item is displayed with a `DodgerBlue` background with Navy titles. 如果数据对象的 *SpecialFeatures* 值为 " *突出显示*"，则第二个 活动将处于活动状态，从而导致显示带有星号的橙色边框的项。If the data object has a *SpecialFeatures* value of *Highlight*, then the second will be active, causing the item to be displayed with an Orange border with a star. 有关完整示例，请参阅 [数据绑定演示](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete sample, see [Data Binding Demo](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703). [!code-xaml[DataBindingLab#AuctionItemsDataTriggers](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/DataBindingLabApp.xaml#auctionitemsdatatriggers)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要与数据对象的属性值比较的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value to be compared with the property value of the data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` 此值与的属性生成的属性值进行比较 。This value is compared with the property value produced by the property of the . 该比较是一项引用相等性检查。The comparison is a reference equality check. 如果两个值相等，则会应用关联的操作或资源库。If the two values are equal, then the associated actions or setters are applied. 请注意，必须 在上指定和 属性，以 使数据触发器有意义。Note that you must specify both the and properties on a for the data trigger to be meaningful. 如果未设置其中一个或两个属性，则将引发异常。If one or both properties are not set, an exception will be thrown. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，的将 绑定到 *位置*，即 *位置* 对象。In the following example, the of the is bound to *Places*, an of *Place* objects. *放置* 对象具有属性 *名称* 和 *状态*。*Place* objects have properties *Name* and *State*. 每个都 显示一个 *位置* 对象。Each of the displays a *Place* object. 示例中的将应用于每个 。The in the example is applied to each . 指定了， 以便在*位置*数据项的*状态*为 "WA" 时，相应的前景 设置为红色。The is specified such that if the *State* of the *Place* data item is "WA" then the foreground of the corresponding is set to Red. [!code-xaml[DataTrigger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTrigger/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] 下面的示例演示了 在中定义的两个 。The following example shows two s that are defined in a . 应用于*AuctionItem*数据对象 (在此示例中未显示) ，其属性为*SpecialFeatures*。The is applied to *AuctionItem* data objects (not shown in this example), which have the property *SpecialFeatures*. 有关完整示例，请参阅 [数据绑定演示](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703) 。See [Data Binding Demo](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703) for the complete example. 首先指定了第一个， 以便在数据对象的 *SpecialFeatures* 值为 *Color*时，使用带有深蓝色标题的 DodgerBlue 背景来显示项。The first is specified such that if the data object has a *SpecialFeatures* value of *Color*, then the item is displayed with a DodgerBlue background with Navy titles. 如果数据对象的 *SpecialFeatures* 值为 " *突出显示*"，则第二个 活动将处于活动状态，从而导致显示带有星号的橙色边框的项。If the data object has a *SpecialFeatures* value of *Highlight*, then the second will be active, causing the item to be displayed with an Orange border with a star. [!code-xaml[DataBindingLab#AuctionItemsDataTriggers](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/DataBindingLabApp.xaml#auctionitemsdatatriggers)]
